name: Gaia: Paradise Simulation Level 5 Build One
name_original: Gaia: Paradise Simulation Level 5 Build One
description:
Build one of my level. File was too big for the HTML browser. So instead I uploaded a standalone version for both mac and windows. Try to find all 7 batteries. They aren't really hidden yet, so it should be easy. You will need to keep count because there is no mechanics yet.

-Joseph
